snippet: When it comes to Bruce Springsteen, Gov. Chris Christie of New Jersey knows all the lyrics, has been to 130 shows and, after the devastation from Hurricane Sandy, can now call him a friend.
abstract: New Jersey Gov Chris Christie idolizes Bruce Springsteen, but his warm feelings have long been unrequited; topsy-turvy politics wrought by Hurricane Sandy have changed that dynamic, and Christie says that Springsteen embraced him after performing at a benefit concert for victims of Hurricane Sandy.
lead_paragraph: When it comes to Bruce Springsteen, Gov. Chris Christie of New Jersey knows all the lyrics, has been to 130 shows and, after the devastation from Hurricane Sandy, can now call him a friend.

headline.seo: Gov. Christie Receives Support From Bruce Springsteen
